original_title: L'Aretino nei suoi ragionamenti sulle cortigiane, le maritate e... i cornuti contenti
overview: Madonna Violante goes to Rome to find the three Armida daughters, Lorenza and Vanna, who she has not seen for many years; but first she stops by her friend Antonia from whom he learned many unseemly things about them.
title: Aretino's Blue Stories
